subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Shadow Play won the $551,225 Little Brown Jug at Delaware County Fairgrounds in Ohio, pulling away for a six-and-a-quarter-length victory in the second leg of the pacing Triple Crown. Shadow Play, a black colt, paced a mile in 1:50 1/5.
snippet: Shadow Play won the $551,225 Little Brown Jug at Delaware County Fairgrounds in Ohio, pulling away for a six-and-a-quarter-length victory in the second leg of the pacing Triple Crown. Shadow Play, a black colt, paced a mile in 1:50 1/5.
